import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useHistory, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { createDeck } from '../utils/api/index' export default function CreateDeck({ deckList, setDeckList }) { const initialState = { name: '', description: '', } const [updatedDecks, setUpdatedDecks] = useState(...deckList) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ ...initialState }) const history = useHistory() const handleChange = ({ target }) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [target.name]: target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() const newDeck = await createDeck(formData) setUpdatedDecks([...deckList, newDeck]) history.push(`/decks/${newDeck.id}`) } return (
  1. Home
